name: SKDownloadState
desc: The states that a download operation can be in.

items.name: case waiting
items.desc: Indicates that the download has not started yet.

items.name: case active
items.desc: Indicates that the content is currently being downloaded.

items.name: case paused
items.desc: Indicates that your app paused the download.

items.name: case finished
items.desc: Indicates that the content was successfully downloaded.

items.name: case failed
items.desc: Indicates that an error occurred while the file was being downloaded.

items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: Indicates that your app canceled the download.
